description:
I'm kind of a villainess, but I'm not interested in princes or dresses. Please don't drag me into your reverse harem.
Magic is awesome. Demonic beasts are cute. I love my brother. I'm going to avoid villains and princesses and live with demonic beasts in the countryside.
